department.en: Institute of Materials Science and Engineering
department.ch: 材料科學與工程研究所碩士班

goal.en: “Before the completion of this course each student should be able to: 1. Understand basic principles of electronic materials and devices 2. Understand the electrical and optical properties of electronic materials and devices 3. Describe the fundamentals of measurement methods for electronic materials and devices 4. Understand the importance and applications of electronic materials and devices in high-tech industry“
goal.ch: 本課程目標為介紹電子材料與元件之基本特性，此外並將嘗試介紹不同電子材料與元件於產業界之應用，除了引導同學對電子材料與元件有初步的概念外、亦讓同學對其在產業界的應用有所瞭解。

content.en:
1. Principles of semiconductor materials and devices
2. Resistivity and contact resistance
3. Carrier and doping concentration
4. Ohmic and Schottky contacts
6. Introduction to electronic devices
content.ch:
1. 半導體元件物理簡介
2. 薄膜電阻概念與量測
3. 載子與摻雜濃度介紹
4. 接觸電阻
5. 蕭特基能障
6. 電子元件簡介

textbook.en: “Principles of Electronic Materials and Devices, S. O. Kasap (McGraw-Hill) Semiconductor Material and Device Characterization, D. Schroder (Wiley)“
textbook.ch: “Principles of Electronic Materials and Devices, S. O. Kasap (McGraw-Hill) Semiconductor Material and Device Characterization, D. Schroder (Wiley)“

grading.ch: “出席/課堂表現: 10％ 期中考1: 30％ 期中考2: 30％ 期末報告: 30％“

flex_desc.en: Final two-week lectures will be conducted by watching videos
flex_desc.ch: 最後兩週將以影片補充相關課程知識
